name: Call Of The Shadows- Demo
description:
Hello brave player ! In this game you have the role of a mechanic who was sent for training (Testing Center).You will be directed in the old testing center because the new testing center was closed for unknown reasons.Your task will be simple about the day shift to follow the serviceability of all mechanisms in a shift to make sure no one entered the building.We urge you not to go into the storage room. Everything will be fine good luck.

INSTRUCTIONS
To play this game, you need to manuever through the 3 floors by using
W,S, and X.
W- 1st Floor
S- 2nd Floor
X- 3rd Floor
Use "E" to shine your light at the rooms.
Whenever your energy meter is going low , go the 3rd floor and recharge it!

If your fear meter is going up, quickly change to a different floor!
They might catch you, if you're too slow!
